column4: Hey guys, im using gnome3 and realised the panel at the bottom does not show all my applications.Is there any way to add that?
panel at the bottom? it's not supposed to show all your applications
unless i'm mistaken it's like the notification area from gnome2
ok I thought I may do as I saw other had that. (in screenshops), its got allarm clock and removable devices at the mo
mind showing me the screenshot?
is it cba123s screenshot?
ill find one quick, not sure with your last question
here are some screenshots http://live.gnome.org/GnomeShell/Screenshots the applications seem to be at the bottom right
yeah that's the notification area
what applications should appear there?
there is in fact a gnome3 extension to have that positioned in the top right if you want
typcially any application that has a notification icon
I thought many of my applications would be down there but there not
and i notice each empathy chat session with a user has an individual icon too
i literally just have to applications down there and would like my chat one and some others like my music player
you don't "put" applications there manually
airtonix,i thought I may need to setup notifications for certain apps
lol. I will leave it then, thanks.
http://www.webupd8.org/2011/10/official-gnome-shell-extensions.html
thanks.I have banshee on there now. I just turned on notifications
i will have a look at extentions :)
